hero.title: Korean Home Cooking from Sydney

hero.description: Jeena's Kitchen is about Korean Home Cooking Story from my small kitchen in Sydney. Where every meal connects hearts and homes.

warmth.title: Warmth

thoughtfulness.title: Thoughtfulness
thoughtfulness.description: Carefully made, down to every detail.

contact.title: Collaborate with Jeena's Kitchen
contact.description: Interested in working with Jeena's Kitchen? I collaborate with food, lifestyle, and wellness brands on sponsored content, recipe development, and events. Let's discuss how we can bring your vision to life.

seo.title: Jeena's Kitchen - Korean Recipe Videos & Interactive Cooking Guide
seo.description: Discover authentic Korean recipes with Jeena's Kitchen. Learn to cook Korean BBQ, tteokbokki, kimchi, and more with interactive themed cooking experiences and video tutorials.
